house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1947 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) and approximately 4251 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include view, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, storage space.
house_listing.firm_name: Esslinger-Wooten-M Esslinger-Wooten-M Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Fenced, Foyer, Kitchen Island, Outdoor Lights, StorageSpace, Wet Bar
